content.text: The metric defines cognitive distance between layers: | Layers | d(x, y) | | ------------- | ------- | | P₀ ↔ R | 1 | | R ↔ I | 2 | | I ↔ A | 3 | | A ↔ Ø | ∞ | | Ø ↔ anything | ∞ | > Ø is infinitely distant from everything but can project onto other layers via singularity \(Φ\).
